verses.name: Genesis 35:11
verses.text: And God said unto him, I am God Almighty: be fruitful and multiply; a nation and a company of nations shall be of thee, and kings shall come out of thy loins;

verses.name: Genesis 35:12
verses.text: And the land which I gave Abraham and Isaac, to thee I will give it, and to thy seed after thee will I give the land.

verses.name: Genesis 35:13
verses.text: And God went up from him in the place where he talked with him.
